ModMetaData.name: AntiAutoUnload
ModMetaData.author: user19990313
ModMetaData.description:
AntiAutoUnload 禁用原版卸载功能
这个mod允许你禁用原版游戏的两个令人恼火的功能： 1.远行队定居时，自动将所有物资丢在地图中心 2.远行队回到地图时，自动指派卸载物资的工作 默认禁用第一项而不禁用第二项，不过你可以随时更改设定。
This mod could disable the two annoying features in vanilla game: 1.Things in the cargo slot are automatically dropped at the center of the map when you settle in world map. 2.Things in the cargo slots are automatically marked as "To be unloaded" when a player-controlled caravan enter a player base. As default,the first feature is disabled and the second is not,but you can change the settings whenever you want.
在“设置-Mod选项”里点击按钮，从悬浮框中选择“AntiAutoUnload”，即可在此GUI界面中进行设置。
Use "Options->Mod Settings"and click the button,choose "AntiAutoUnload" in the float menu,then you can configure the two settings.
加入/移除这个mod不需要开新档，也不会损坏旧存档（旧存档载入地图时会有mod不匹配的提示，忽略即可）
You can activate/disable this mod halfaway without corrupting your saves(there will be a window"Mod Inconsistent",just ignore it).
注入时可能会有一条黄字，属正常现象。
There might be a warning when loading the mod,ignore it,because that's a safety check :P
排序时请放在Core后面。 如果遇到问题，请将问题反馈到贴吧链接。
Load this mod after Core. Please post any related bugs to the forum thread.
注1.如果你关闭了2（并且远行队回到了地图）又重新打开它，驮运动物身上的货物也不会被主动卸载，除非你用这些队伍再次组建远行队并回到地图。不过你可以点击货物旁的下箭头让货物直接掉落在地上。 注2.可以搭配worktab扩展功能1，详见贴吧链接。
PS.All the caravans that entered player map with feature2 disabled won't unload their cargo,until they returned player map with feature2 enabled.Well,you could manually unload by clicking down arrow at the Cargo tab.
